Articles.Content: Would you need an artist to "draw" fire?
Most likely not, but then again, 9 out of 10 people addicted to brake fluid can't stop.

I went to a microwave hall to find a replacement for a broken one.  

I got fried.
Fried? Doughnut fret about it...

What do you get when you divide the circumference of a pumpkin by it's diameter?

Spoiler

Pumpkin π !

Pi are square? No, pi are not square. Pi are round.

Cornbread are square.

![peAj7ND.png](https://i.imgur.com/peAj7ND.png)

If I get an edge parity on this 4x4x4x4, I'm going to *flip!*

i m gonna triple or quadruple post, i just had a dream, then woke up, then 2 days later i leanred about the event, then 9 days later i made the link ... within the vid and the event, leave me in (my ?) lite autist autist corner, don't approach too close, i may summon a black hole, without intent get it ?  

and let ,this necrosis get ride of me, i m done with you all  

... oh it's been censored ? once again really ? well well, watch your step peops, as i watch mine
